name: Kaiten
headline: Find culinary products and experiences from great makers everywhere
description:
Kaiten is a discovery app that gives you access to culinary products and experiences from quality makers around the world. 
We are home to hundreds of makers from around the world including restaurants, chefs, farmers, vineyards and even knife makers and ceramicists. Find new ways to enjoy the culinary world every day. A special bottle of wine, soy sauce from a 100 year old brewery in Kyoto, working a day at a Michelin star restaurant - if amazing people make it and sell it, you'll find it on Kaiten.

founders.name: Alex Matsenov, Founder
founders.description: Alex is the co-founder and CEO of Gauss Money. Alex led credit at Nordea Bank and MDM Bank. He's a 3x founder, 2x YC. Alex has an advance degree in machine learning, was a late stage venture investor in the machine learning space, and is a huge fan of fundamental physics and artificial intelligence research.

founders.name: Daniel Shein, Founder
founders.description: Life long engineer, 2nd life as restauranteur.

generated_description:
**Kaiten: Rediscover the Culinary World**

Founded in 2019 and nestled in New York City as part of Y Combinator's Batch W20, Kaiten is your gateway to a treasure trove of culinary delights sourced from skilled artisans across the globe. Their mission is clear and passionate: to connect food lovers with remarkable culinary products and experiences crafted by exceptional makers.

Imagine a platform where you can find everything from artisanal soy sauce dating back to a 100-year-old brewery in Kyoto, to a day spent in a Michelin-starred restaurant kitchen. Kaiten brings together a diverse community of makers—chefs, farmers, vineyards, knife makers, ceramicists, and more—allowing you to explore new flavors and experiences every day.

**What Makes Kaiten Special?**
- **Expert Curation**: Their team of food lovers—comprised of restaurateurs, food photographers, and writers—travels the world, hand-picking unique products that embody the spirit of their makers and the culinary traditions they represent.
- **Diverse Offerings**: From exquisite wines to handcrafted kitchen tools, their catalog is filled with exclusive items that aren't just products; they're stories waiting to enhance your dining experience.
- **Sustainable Practices**: Kaiten believes in the power of genuine connections between quality and community. They curate their selection to support artisans and promote sustainable culinary practices, addressing challenges in the ever-evolving restaurant industry.

**Stay Tuned for Seasonal Delights**
KaiTen is keen on keeping the culinary excitement alive for every season, offering products that enhance your experience in your kitchen and at the table. With holiday offerings featuring limited-edition olive oils, unique ceramics, and more, there’s always something to celebrate.

**Get Involved**: If you're seeking culinary joy, Kaiten is ready to assist. Whether you need help selecting the perfect item or exploring experiences, their team is just a message away. 

To discover the myriad of culinary products waiting for you, head over to [Kaiten's website](http://www.onkaiten.com) and elevate your daily meals into exceptional culinary moments!
